subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Colleges and Universities
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: It may be time to do away with the one-year rule, which since 2006 has effectively required players to spend at least a year in college before entering the N.B.A. draft.
snippet: It may be time to do away with the one-year rule, which since 2006 has effectively required players to spend at least a year in college before entering the N.B.A. draft.
